exchangeLuckyballComment: Uwakhulule amanqaku akho ukuze ufumane iBhola yeThamsanqa.
inviteLuckyballComment: Ufumene iBhola yeThamsanqa ngokumema umhlobo wakho.
luckyDrawUseBallComment: Usebenzise iBhola yeThamsanqa ukungena kwiDro yeThamsanqa.
partnerMailContents1: Nceda ujonge amaxwebhu afunekayo ekuvunyweni kweqabane kwaye uthumele impendulo kunye nefayile eqhotyoshelweyo!
partnerMailContents3:
Nceda uqhoboshele ikopi yekhadi lakho lesazisi okanye incwadana yokundwendwela
ukuqinisekisa isazisi seqabane lakho.
partnerMailContents5:
Nceda ujonge amaxwebhu kunye nolwazi olufunekayo
ukuze ufumane imvume yeqabane kwaye usithumelele impendulo!
partnerMailContents6: (Uhlobo lwentengiselwano, inombolo yomzila, inombolo ye-akhawunti, igama lokuqala lomnini-akhawunti, igama eliphakathi, ifani, inombolo yefowuni ephathwayo yomamkeli, njl.njl.)
partnerMailContents8:
Nceda usithumelele inombolo yefowuni apho unokufumaneka khona
ukunxibelelana neqabane lakho.
partnerMailContents9:
Nceda uthumele impendulo yakho nge-imeyile ku-partner@buflexz.com .
Emva kokuba iqela lokusebenza lijonge impendulo, ukuhlolwa kweqabane kunye nokuvunywa kuya kuqhutyelwa phambili.
authMailContents4:
Nceda ngenisa inombolo yoqinisekiso enamanani ama-6 ngqo kuqinisekiso
window ngaphakathi kwe-app okanye khuphela kwaye uncamathisele inombolo yoqinisekiso.
authMailContents5:
Le imeyile yeyokuthumela kuphela.
Iimpendulo azinakwenzeka, ke ukuba unayo nayiphi na imibuzo okanye izinto eziphazamisayo,
Nceda uqhagamshelane nathi kwiziko labathengi ngaphakathi kwe-BUFLEXZ app.
